description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire. Previously eaten by Portgas D. Ace, the fruit has reappeared and is being offered as the prize for the Corrida Colosseum tournament.

abilities.description: User can create and control fire at will
User can transform their body into fire, making physical attacks pass through them

keyMoments.title: Mera Mera no Mi as Tournament Prize
keyMoments.description: The Mera Mera no Mi is revealed as the grand prize for the Corrida Colosseum tournament, drawing 556 competitors including Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: The reappearance of Ace's Devil Fruit is emotionally significant for Luffy and creates a major plot point for the arc.

strengths: Powerful offensive capabilities with fire-based attacks
Can nullify ice-based attacks to some degree
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (seawater, Seastone, Haki)
Vulnerable to superior fire (like Akainu's magma)

reveals.information: The Mera Mera no Mi has reappeared after Ace's death and is being used as a tournament prize by Doflamingo
